title: Drippler Crippler
summaries: The Drippler Crippler is a Hardmode flail which, in addition to the usual flail mechanics, fires a thorny ball projectile from the flail's head upon being thrown, which deals 50% of the weapon's base damage (73 damage). Thorny ball projectiles are heavily affected by gravity and dissipate after ricocheting off solid blocks twice or upon piercing two enemies. The Drippler Crippler has a 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped by the Blood Eel.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 4 GC
